body:
Hello @JesperDramsch! Thanks for updating the PR.

 - In the file [`pandas/core/strings.py`](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/1f43f874eec176e12cc148c54cf2ac1f7442055c/pandas/core/strings.py), following are the PEP8 issues :
